text: Tonka Tomicic Petric (; born 31 May 1976) is a Chilean model and television presenter of Croat origin. ==Career== She first came to public attention as the Chilean representative to the 1995 Miss World pageant. Soon after she was invited to the program Pase lo que Pase of TVN as a fashion commentator. She received her big break when she became one of the principal co-presenters of this program and went on to assume the co-presenter role of Buenos dias a todos, a popular morning television show. In February 2006, Tomičić was elected Queen of the Viña del Mar International Music Festival, and in 2007 she was presentor of the same festival with Sergio Lagos. == Television == Year Program Role Networks 2001 Combinado Nacional Megavisión 2001 La mañana del 13 Canal 13 2002 Los 10 + pedidos VJ MTV 2002 Pase lo que pase TV Hostess TVN 2003 La gran sorpresa TV presenter TVN 2005-2009 Buenos días a todos TV Hostess TVN 2006 Telethon Chile ANATEL 2007 Telethon Chile ANATEL 2008 Hijos Del Monte TVN 2009 Telethon Chile ANATEL 2010 El hormiguero Canal 13 2010 Viva la mañana Guest Star Canal 13 2010 La movida del festival TV Hostess Canal 13 2010 Chile ayuda a Chile ANATEL 2010 Tonka Tanka TV Hostess Canal 13 2010 Primera Dama Canal 13 2010 Fear Factor Chile Canal 13 2010 Alfombra roja Canal 13 2010 Telethon Chile ANATEL Since 2011 Bienvenidos TV Hostess Canal 13 2011 Asesora sin hogar Soledad Cazas / Contemplación Sanhueza Canal 13 2011 Telethon Chile ANATEL 2012 Mundos opuestos Guest Star Canal 13 2012 No basta con ser bella: Miss Chile 2012 Jury Canal 13 2012 Telethon Chile TV Hostess ANATEL 2013 Proyecto Miss Chile TV Hostess Canal 13 ==References== == Other websites == * Terra.cl Erika Cabrera: Los secretos de belleza de Tonka Tomicic, July 30, 2008, accessed July 30, 2008 * * Blog de Tonka Tomicic en Caras. * Biografias.es Tonka Tomicic Category:1976 births Category:Chilean models Category:Chilean television presenters Category:Living people Category:People from Santiago
